issue.title: [Rust] StructArray builder and From<> methods should check that field types match schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4968](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4968). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to how we assert that array data types are equal to their field types, we should do the same for StructArray and StructBuilder where necessary
